articles.description: 'Once people start thinking about what they want, which is a non-sovereign, safe-haven store of value, they’re going to realize that Bitcoin does the job of gold better'

articles.title: Airtel to shutdown copper network; to offer only fiber broadband: Gopal Vittal - ETTelecom.com
